meanings.definition: a small booklet or leaflet containing information or arguments about a single subject
meanings.sent1: I picked up a pamphlet about recycling at the library.
meanings.sent2: She handed out pamphlets explaining the importance of voting.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the pamphlet as a tiny umbrella during the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pamphlet of memories, each page filled with moments.
meanings.sent5: The pamphlet on fire safety was illustrated with colorful pictures to help kids remember.

meanings.sent1: The organization decided to pamphlet the neighborhood to raise awareness.
meanings.sent2: He pamphleted the event to attract more attendees.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to help by pamphleting the house with its paw prints.
meanings.sent4: Her words pamphleted through the crowd, spreading the message far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers pamphleted the town with invitations to the charity event.
